item.title: Aviatrix Certified Engineer (ACE) Professional
item.description: I recently went through the professional certification from Aviatrix. It’s a great way for all IT professionals to expand their knowledge in Cloud Infrastructure and Networking. The certification is valuable for all roles, whether at a systems integrator or partner, end customer, or as a technical role at a Cloud Service Provider (CSP).
